name: Vector Velocity
description: In Vector Velocity movement is the name of the game. Run, Jump, Slide, Climb, Grind, Skid, Zipline and ultimately race your way from point A to B as fast as you can.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 4-core CPU (including dual-core processors with hyperthreading) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 100 MB available space
